DOC.brief_summary: Chest X-ray and/or fluoroscopy routinely use OR confirm endotracheal tube ( ETT ) placement anesthesiologist . Multiple study show ~19 % intubation result inappropriate ETT placement . An adult study show ultrasound point-of-care superior auscultation determine location ETT . This study aim determine point-of-care useful determine ETT position child .
DOC.brief_title: Intra-op POCUS Identification Endotracheal Tube Position Pediatric Population
DOC.detailed_description: Patients schedule procedure cardiovascular laboratory fluoroscopy routinely use also undergo point-of-care ultrasound exam determine endotracheal tube position . An anesthesiologist perform ultrasound exam .
DOC.criteria: 1. child birth 10 year age ; 2. undergoing cardiac catheterization cath lab ; 3. general anesthesia endotracheal tube ; 4. subject also receive chest xray standard care 1. child age birth 10 year undergoing cardiac catheterization GA without endotracheal tube ; 2. emergency procedure ; 3. know airway anomaly ; 4. child nonEnglish nonSpanish speaking
